description.narrative: The Government of Bangladesh's Third Primary Education Development Program (PEDP 3) is designed as a (sub) Sector Wide Approach (SWAp) encompassing all interventions and funding that support pre-primary and primary education in Bangladesh. The goal of PEDP 3 is quality education for all children. The specific objective is to establish 'an efficient, inclusive, and equitable primary education system that delivers effective learning to all of Bangladesh's children from pre-primary through Grade 5.' The four inter-related components of PEDP3 have the following objectives: Quality - All children acquire the planned learning outcomes and competencies in the classroom; Universal access and participation - All children enrol and complete the primary cycle; Organizational Development and Institutional Strengthening - The core functions at central through District and Upazilla to school level are efficiently and satisfactorily performed; and Sector and Programme Planning and Management - avai
